AC01.title: Prevention
AC01.description: Pre-event or in-event risk prevention mechanisms, such as blocking, interception, and restriction measures.

AC02.title: Perception
AC02.description: Pre-event or in-event risk perception mechanisms, such as monitoring, alerting, and early warning measures.

AC03.title: Detection
AC03.description: In-event risk detection mechanisms, such as identification, verification, and recognition measures.

AC04.title: Disposition
AC04.description: In-event or post-event risk disposition mechanisms, such as handling, response, and remediation measures.
